LanguageData.DownwardMindhexLargeInfestation: {0_nameDef} has completed {RITUAL_definite} ritual with impressive power and precision! The mindhex has hit a massive underground hive, attracting about double the insectoids that would've showed up otherwise. Prepare for the swarm!
LanguageData.DownwardMindhexInfestation: {0_nameDef} has completed {RITUAL_definite} ritual; the mindhex has hit an underground insectoid hive. They will burrow upwards shortly, frenzied by dark archotech energies.
